body.p: This document document is a training module designed to teach writers the basics of DITA. Additionally, it provides an opportunity for writers to test editing in DITA in a sandbox environment. As you progress through the document, feel free to modify it to practice the DITA functions you learn.
Note that there are various structured exercises included in the document, marked by the Exercise text.
The document is structured to be progressed through chronologically, beginning with setting up the Oxygen editor to optimize your workflow.
